hàozhào call; appeal

huǎnmàn slow

dìdiǎn place; site; location
chéngpǐn finished goods; a finished product

traditional: 拒絕
jùjué to refuse; to decline; to reject

traditional: 不許
bùxǔ not allow; must not; can't

traditional: 自從
zìcóng since (a time); ever since

traditional: 優勢
yòushì superiority
yōushì superior; dominant

traditional: 審查
shěnchá to examine; to investigate

traditional: 調動
diàodòng to transfer; to maneuver (troops etc)

traditional: 特權
tèquán prerogative; privilege; privileged

dāying reply; promise
